p: In our study, we determined the quantitative and qualitative composition of the bioactive compounds, the predominant compounds in each of the fractions and the antioxidant and antimicrobial activities in each of them. The chemical composition of oregano (Ooil), of its fractions obtained by fractional vacuum distillation (F1â€“F4) and the undistilled remnant (Unoil) was different in each of them.
